Shivah::

Shivah heard when Silverscout moved, he hit one time the pod's door 
and shouted, he knew that the mutant could heard her "You can't 
escape of this pod, so be patient, if all things results right you 
can be fly freely; but if you tried to scape, you will die... 
Understands?"


The Lava shields was down. Soon the door will open and Shivah will 
leave the base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF47

<cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Silver Scout acted like a rabid animal biting and slashing at the 
pod. Her systems worked slowly repairing the self inflicted wounds 
that her struggling had caused. In a desperate act she transformed to 
her hawk form and began beating her wings in a futile escape attempt. 
Until her repairs were complete she had little hope of thinking like 
a bot.
